content: I've got a host that I set up with multiple domains pointing to the same host. I was able to create multiple organizations and can log in with the respective email addresses, but when I try to register with a new account it seems to be unable to match which realm I'm trying to create an account on.
Yeah, so if you have multiple realms on the same server, the recommended approach is to use subdomains

If you're not doing that, you can invite users to join realms, but you can also point your users at a per-realm registration page for that realm like this: https://chat.zulip.org/register/tabbott/ (where tabbott here is the string_id for the realm)
That worked, thanks! I will also work on setting up the subdomain settings so that the function properly.
